articles.author: Rohan Nadkarni
articles.title: Why Caitlin Clark's latest injury is terrible timing for the WNBA - NBC News
articles.description: Last August, the WNBA announced that Indianapolis — home of the Indiana Fever and Caitlin Clark — would host the league’s All-Star weekend this season for the first time
articles.content:
Last August, the WNBA announced that Indianapolis home of the Indiana Fever and Caitlin Clark would host the leagues All-Star weekend this season for the first time.
